descriptions.description: Flips the image verticaly (type param=0) or horizontaly (type param=1). A new JSImage is returned.

summaries.summary: Flips the image verticaly (type param=0) or horizontaly (type param=1).

samples.sample: var image = plugins.images.getImage(byteArray_or_file_or_filename);//loads the image image = image.flip(0);//flip vertically var bytes = image.getData();//gets the image bytes plugins.file.writeFile('filename',bytes);//saves the image bytes
